definition: down/downward
surname Xiang
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
top-down

sentences.english: Scroll down to read about the latest update, or just click here.
sentences.chinese: 滚动鼠标向下，阅读最新的更新，或者点击这里。

sentences.english: When I looked down the hall I saw what looked like a transparent hunchback limping toward us.
sentences.chinese: 我向下看，看到一个驼背的跛子向我们走来。

sentences.english: A grading and styling design of garment pattern pieces is described in a top-down way.
sentences.chinese: 介绍服装样片分类和款式的自顶向下设计方法。

sentences.english: Fill it with White andnudgeit down another 1px then press Delete.
sentences.chinese: 用白色填充再向下轻移1px然后删除。

sentences.english: Lie face down on the floor with your elbows bent and your palms next to your shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 脸朝地板向下，肘关节弯曲，手心靠近肩膀。

sentences.english: The top-down management support should not be confused with the rollout approach.
sentences.chinese: 自顶向下的管理支持不应该与铺展过程相混淆。

sentences.english: You could also embed the sideway approach within the top-down or bottom-up approach.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以在自顶向下或自底向上方法中嵌入旁路方法。

sentences.english: The rubble was moving. It was pressing down, slowly crushing them.
sentences.chinese: 瓦砾还在不断地向下滚动，碾压着他们的身体。

sentences.english: Thus, ice floats on water and a body of water freezes from the top down.
sentences.chinese: 因此，冰浮在水上，水体从上向下冻结。

sentences.english: Slides easily up the rope and jams when the cam is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 防坠器向上滑动自如，而向下受重时凸轮会制停。

sentences.english: Normal breathing is accomplished by contracting the dome-shaped diaphragm downward into a flat shape.
sentences.chinese: 顶状的横隔膜向下压缩成水平状来完成的。

sentences.english: Front fold-down panel can be secured in different positions for temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 前折向下面板很安全，各个不同方向的温度控制。

sentences.english: Suspension type thumb nut is used for fastening so that it can be quickly opened up sand downward is conventient for maintenance.
sentences.chinese: 采用碟型活节螺栓紧固，能快速向下开启，便于维修。

sentences.english: They swung huge car advertisements from the top of the tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 他们从高楼顶上向下悬挂了巨大的汽车广告。

sentences.english: After the downward roll, I begin a recovery pull to level out.
sentences.chinese: 在向下滚转之后，我开始重新拉到水平退出。

definition: upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
(of trains) down (i.e. away from the capital)/(of river boats) to travel downstream/to issue (a document) to lower bureaucratic levels/(of writing on the page) vertical, proceeding from top to bottom
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
to vibrate/to shake/to shudder
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
to rise (i.e. number increases)/a price rise/to raise
to disperse/to diverge
lowest point/minimum (point)
out/outward
moving average index (used in financial analysis)
forward/onward
high position/eminent status/top job/raised position/upper (limbs)/a high (i.e. local maximum)/high point on scale, high grade, temperature, latitude etc
phony/so-called/armchair (expert)/vain (promise)/(finance) short-seller/bear (market)/short (selling)
backward
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to stand firm
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
